content.text:
# Draft:List of United States Republican Presidencies

----
â‰¤if
The Republican Party was founded in 1854. They quickly rose to popularity, managing to narrowly lose the 1856 United States presidential election. The first Republican President was Abraham Lincoln  in 1861. There have been 19 Republican presidents so far.
